Module Tic.Tac.Toe
Package edu.saddleback.tictactoe.decision

Class Minimax

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.saddleback.tictactoe.decision.Minimax
  • public class Minimax
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the brain of the AI, chooses the best move to make to beat the user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Minimax​(StaticEvaluator staticEvaluator, Node treeRoot)
      Assigns the specific evauator and tree root for this instance of the AI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Board bestMove​(Node parent)
      Decides on the best move to make based on the best score out of each possible move's score, and returns the updated board.
      int minimax​(Node n, int depth, boolean max)
      Goes through each possible choice in the game decision tree and calculates the best decision score, based on the calculated score from the given static evaluator.
      void setEvaluator​(StaticEvaluator ev)
      Sets the static evaluator to the given evaluator.
